CustomField.formula: IF(Report_Validation_Prod__c==0,"Ok","Warning") + IF(Acres_1_Validation__c!=0," | Acres vs Parent Seed","") + IF(Bushels_1_Validation__c!=0," | Bushels vs Acres","") + IF(Supply_1_Validation__c!=0," | Supply vs Bushels","") + IF(Acres_All_Validation__c!=0," | Acres vs Previous Acres","")+ IF(Bushels_All_Validation__c!=0," | Bushels vs Previous Bushels","") + IF(Supply_All_Validation__c!=0," | Supply vs Previous Supply","") + IF(Forecast_Validation__c!=0," | Forecast vs Forecast","")
CustomField.label: Report Validation Msg
